entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -34.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -34.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -38.4°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 39.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
